name: Taurin
description: Towering, bull-headed humanoids whose cultures emphasize honor, craftsmanship, and physical discipline. Taurin often live in mountain strongholds or cliffside fortresses.

features.name: Primal Senses
features.description: You are proficient in Perception checks and have advantage on Perception checks.

features.name: Horn Attack
features.description: You are proficient with your horns. You may make an unarmed attack dealing 1d6 + Might modifier piercing damage.

features.name: Immovable
features.description: You have advantage on checks and saving throws to resist being shoved or knocked prone.
